Author: galacticmarble
Text: I like to try to improve short term things with my appearance, so I feel like at least something on my body is pretty. i like to shower and give myself a pedicure while listening to music or podcasts, and i feel a bit better knowing that i smell good and have pretty feet.  when i feel super gross my hygiene is the first thing to go, so if i get that in order then i know that not everything about me is bad

Author: CulturalAvocado
Text: following.  im the same :( so easily triggered as well, can be a bad hair day or catching an unflattering reflection or even seeing a pretty skinny person when im out - will make me want to restrict.
